010package imagingbook.pub.threshold.adaptive;
011
012import ij.plugin.filter.RankFilters;
013import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
014import imagingbook.lib.util.ParameterBundle;
015import imagingbook.pub.threshold.BackgroundMode;
016
017/**
018 * This implementation of Bernsen's thresholder uses a circular support region,
019 * implemented with ImageJ's built-in rank-filter methods.
020 */
021public class BernsenThresholder extends AdaptiveThresholder {
022        
023        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle {
024                public int radius = 15;
025                public int cmin = 15;
026                public BackgroundMode bgMode = BackgroundMode.DARK;
027        }
028        
029        private final Parameters params;
030        
031        public BernsenThresholder() {
032                this.params = new Parameters();
033        }
034        
035        public BernsenThresholder(Parameters params) {
036                this.params = params;
037        }
038
039        @Override
040        public ByteProcessor getThreshold(ByteProcessor I) {
041                final int M = I.getWidth();
042                final int N = I.getHeight();
043                ByteProcessor Imin = (ByteProcessor) I.duplicate();
044                ByteProcessor Imax = (ByteProcessor) I.duplicate();
045
046                RankFilters rf = new RankFilters();
047                rf.rank(Imin, params.radius, RankFilters.MIN);
048                rf.rank(Imax, params.radius, RankFilters.MAX);
049
050                int q = (params.bgMode == BackgroundMode.DARK) ? 256 : 0;
051                ByteProcessor Q = new ByteProcessor(M, N);
052
053                for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
054                        for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
055                                int gMin = Imin.get(u, v);
056                                int gMax = Imax.get(u, v);
057                                int c = gMax - gMin;
058                                if (c >= params.cmin)
059                                        Q.set(u, v, (gMin + gMax) / 2);
060                                else
061                                        Q.set(u, v, q);
062                        }
063                }
064                return Q;
065        }
066        
067}
